#summary RO Usage Examples

One of the easiest ways to see how a relation is being used is to go to the page for that relation within the context of a particular ontology in OntoBee.

= GO =

 * [http://www.ontobee.org/browser/rdf.php?o=GO&iri=http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/BFO_0000051 has part] in GO

 * [http://www.ontobee.org/browser/rdf.php?o=GO&iri=http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/BFO_0000066 occurs in] in GO

= GO Extensions =

See [http://wiki.geneontology.org/index.php/Ontology_extensions Ontology extensions]
